name: Ecrire
tagline: My blog. It's messy. But it's awesome.
body:
== So you want to start a blog, eh?

Before you start, typing relentlessly on your keyboard and broadcast your ideas to the world, 
here's a few things that you may want to check out.

### How's the editor?

Glad you asked! This blog engine has a few assumptions that I'd like to share with you.
First and foremost, this is built by a web developer for developers. This means that there's the editor provides a little
bit more flexibility than other blogging platform you may know. Features such as:

- HTML editor
- CSS editor
- Javascript editor
- Partials editor and importer
- Image importer

Can give you the freedom to build each and every post the way you intended them to be. I'm pretty sure a wall of text isn't
really telling so here's some visuals to help you understand what this all means!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
